title: Kya bolna hai, asks Rahul Gandhi ahead of Telangana speech, BJP says RG mixing politics with clubbing - India Today
content:
1. Kya bolna hai, asks Rahul Gandhi ahead of Telangana speech, BJP says RG mixing politics with clubbing  India Today
  2. BJP Mocks Rahul Gandhi Over "Theme Kya Hai" Remark, Posts Video  NDTV
  3. Come, let us defeat Telangana Rashtra Samithi: Rahul Gandhi to youth  Times of India
  4. 'Kya Bolna Hai': Rahul Gandhi Once Again In Spotlight Over Candid Video, BJP Attacks Congress MP  India Today
  5. KTR takes jibe at RaGas tour to Telangana, Congress hits back  The Hans India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: BJP leader Amit Malviya shared another video launching a scathing attack on Congress leader Rahul Gandhi over the latter's foreign trips and "nightclubbing". In the video, Rahul Gandhi can be heard asking "kya bolna hai [What do I have to say exactly]?" ahead of his address to farmers in Telangana. Watch the video here.
